title: Put Your Records On
lyrics:
[Verse 1]
(G)Three little birds, (A)sat on my window
(C)And they told me I don't need to wo(G)rry
(G)Summer came like cinna(A)mon, so sweet
(C)Little girls double-dutch on the con(G)crete
(Em)Maybe (B)sometimes, (Em)we've got it wrong, but it's (A) alright
The (C)more things seem to change, the (Cm)more they stay the same
Oh, don't you hesitate

[Chorus]
(G)Girl, put your records on, (A)tell me your favourite song
(C)You go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(G)Sapphire and faded jeans, (A)I hope you get your dreams,
(C)Just go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(C)        You're gonna find your(Cm)self somewhere(G), somehow

[Verse 2]
(G)Blue as the sky, (A)sunburnt and lonely,
(C)Sipping tea in a bar by the road(G)side,
(just relax, just (G)relax)
Don't you let those other (A)boys fool you,
(C)Got to love that afro hair(G) do
(Em)Maybe (B)sometimes, we feel afraid, but it's al(A)right
The (C)more you stay the same, the more (Cm)they seem to change
Don't you think it's strange?

Chorus]
(G)Girl, put your records on, (A)tell me your favourite song
(C)You go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(G)Sapphire and faded jeans, (A)I hope you get your dreams,
(C)Just go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(C)        You're gonna find your(Cm)self somewhere(G), somehow

[Bridge]
(Am)â€™Twas more than I could take, pity for pity's sake
(Em)Some nights kept me awake, (N.C.)I thought that I was stronger(Am)
When you gonna realise, that you don't even (G)have to(C) try (Am)any longer?
(C)Do what you want to

Chorus]
(G)Girl, put your records on, (A)tell me your favourite song
(C)You go ahead, let your (G)hair down (oh, let your hair down!)
(G)Sapphire and faded jeans, (A)I hope you get your dreams (hope you get your dreams)
(C)Just go ahead, let your (G)hair down (sister, let your hair down!)
(C)        You're gonna find your(Cm)self somewhere(G), somehow

(G)Girl, put your records on, (A)tell me your favourite song
(C)You go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(G)Sapphire and faded jeans, (A)I hope you get your dreams,
(C)Just go ahead, let your (G)hair down
(C)        You're gonna find your(Cm)self somewhere(G), somehow
